FuncDef:
The file prompt command modifies the alerting pattern of file operation of the device.
The undo file prompt quiet command restores the default setting.
By default, the alerting pattern is alert.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates no alert is given on the condition that the operation, such as deleting files, can cause some data to be lost or damaged.
-

Enables interactive acknowledgement on the condition that the operation, such as deleting files, can cause some data to be lost or damaged.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the alerting pattern is set to quiet, no alert is given on the condition that the operation, such as deleting files, can cause some data to be lost or damaged.
